hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that under the #entrance of the Fire Temple# a blocked path leads to...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a single #scrub in the crater# sells #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Minuet of Forest#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of time.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: Did you know that the Discord server has a public Plandomizer library?

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that Epona is an exceptional horse. Able to clear canyons in a single bound.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Center Bombable Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #the Minuet of Forest#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Bottom of the Well Small Key# and #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Light Trial Lullaby Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #an Ice Trap#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #an Ice Trap#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Shadow Temple Compass#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Ganon's Castle Small Key#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #4# major items.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #cow in Gerudo Valley# gifts #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Piece of Heart#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #4# major items.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Game Key# can be found #outside Ganon's Castle#.
